channel.title: Posts on gliderkite.io
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on gliderkite.io

item.title: Formicarium
item.description: This article is about swarm intelligence, and how we can try to simulate it to show how collective behavior can unlock better solutions to problems that may otherwise remain unsolved.

item.title: Semeion
item.description: This is an overview of a project I enjoyed working on over the past few months, which is now in a state that I consider good enough to be used for a toy kind of project.
